steps.name: Verify client personal info can be change from UI
check via api that the simple client has been created
search a new client by phone number
assert - search returns one customer in UI
clean all inputs of profile info

steps.name: search client by new phone number via api
assert via api that the client profile info has been updated by comparing name and address

assertThat 'ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=lzczokeZeH, permitAds=true, birthdate=12-16, birthyear=1999, address=Suite 066 733 Koss Lights, North Buddychester, AK 95072, debts=[{"date":"2023-04-28 16:30:50","desc":"0LVvvbaolQ","sum":121618107}], phone=["0503-63-60-42"], email=ken.breitenberg@hotmail.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-04-28 16:30:50","text":"SELrv48Jd4"}], name=Samuel Kassulke, gender=female)'

usingRecursiveComparison '- no overridden equals methods were used in the comparison (except for java types)
- these types were compared with the following comparators:
  - java.lang.Double -> DoubleComparator[precision=1.0E-15]
  - java.lang.Float -> FloatComparator[precision=1.0E-6]
  - java.nio.file.Path -> lexicographic comparator (Path natural order)
- actual and expected objects and their fields were compared field by field recursively even if they were not of the same type, this allows for example to compare a Person to a PersonDto (call strictTypeChecking(true) to change that behavior).
'

assertThat 'ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=lzczokeZeH, permitAds=true, birthdate=12-16, birthyear=1999, address=Suite 066 733 Koss Lights, North Buddychester, AK 95072, debts=[{"date":"2023-04-28 16:30:50","desc":"0LVvvbaolQ","sum":121618107}], phone=["0503-63-60-42"], email=ken.breitenberg@hotmail.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-04-28 16:30:50","text":"SELrv48Jd4"}], name=Samuel Kassulke, gender=female)'

isEqualTo 'ClientGetResponse(id=2975, name=Samuel Kassulke, phone=0503636042, profileImage=client_photo2-r4ck.jpg, address=Suite 066 733 Koss Lights, North Buddychester, AK 95072, status=hWw6_0xjxn, permitAds=false, isUnsubscribed=false, lastAppointment=null, phoneCanonical=+972503636042)'
